channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Hide My WP Ghost
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Hide My WP Ghost

item.title: CVE-2024-6420|2024-07-23T06:00:03.289Z -- unknown -- hide%20my%20wp%20ghost
item.description: The Hide My WP Ghost WordPress plugin before 5.2.02 does not prevent redirects to the login page via the auth_redirect WordPress function, allowing an unauthenticated visitor to access the hidden login page.
